page.title: 04Brisley School
page.content: Brisley C.E. V.A. School was built in 1844 and was enlarged in 1908.It has two classrooms, one can be divided by a folding screen.There is also a cloakroom, toilets, a boiler room and a meals servery .A few people have hot meals from Beetley school but most have packed lunches.The school has a large playground with a soft tennis court marked on it.Next to it there is a little field with a seat on it, next to that there is a big field with a football pitch, a hockey pitch and a race track marked on it.Also there is a bicycle shed and a P.E shed.There are 28 people in school and two teachers, some times there is an extra teacher to help.We have a lot of lessons like history, science, maths ,English ,geography and R.K., and every Tuesday we go to Dereham swimming pool.
